posts.post_title: FS--Lot of 4 SGC T206 green backs....SOLD
posts.post_content:
Lot consists of SGC 40 Sovereign 150 Powell (horizontal), SGC 30 American Beauty 350 Barbeau, SGC 40 American Beauty 350 Lavender, and SGC 40 American Beauty 350 Becker.  All 4 nice, scarce cards for $215 insured delivery.  SOLD

Email me at [url]darren.duet@chouest.com[/url] for scans/inquiries.

Thanks
